title: r/Pettyrevenge "LET ME ROB YOU OR I'M CALLING THE COPS!"
description: r/Pettyrevenge The lady in today's story is a real nut job. This thief steals from her coworkers, and OP gets sick of it. So, OP comes up with a devious plan to catch the thief red-handed. OP creates a trap wallet filled with glitter and powdered food coloring, so when the thief opens the wallet, it explodes all over her hands! The thief becomes furious about this and demands that management call the cops on OP for not letting her steal in peace! WTF?
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
